events.name: ReturnInitiated
events.description: Captures the start of the return process when a customer decides to return a product.

events.name: ReturnApproved
events.description: Denotes when a return request has been validated and approved.

events.name: ReturnRejected
events.description: Indicates a return request that fails validation.

events.name: ReturnCompleted
events.description: Marks the finalization of a return, including notifications to the customer.

commands.name: InitiateReturn
commands.description: Captures the start of the return process when a customer decides to return a product.

commands.name: ApproveReturn
commands.description: Denotes when a return request has been validated and approved.

commands.name: RejectReturn
commands.description: Indicates a return request that fails validation.

commands.name: CompleteReturn
commands.description: Marks the finalization of a return, including notifications to the customer.

integrationPoints.name: OrderProcessing
integrationPoints.description: Integration with Order Processing to update order status on return initiation.

integrationPoints.name: InventoryManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integration to update inventory levels when a return is completed.

integrationPoints.name: CustomerNotification
integrationPoints.description: Integration for notifying customers about the status of their return.
